name: Tractorball
description: Strap into a souped up farm tractor with an added rocket engine and a huge flipper on the front, engage in a game of super sized football and hunt your opponents with a huge array of dirty tricks.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer, 64 bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
